extendedInfo.description: JAZZRADIO.com is the highest ranking and most listened to digital radio network for jazz music fans around the globe and it is now available anywhere you want to listen with your Android device.JAZZRADIO.com offers 30+ channels of the best jazz music available. Each one is hand-programmed by a passionate channel manager who is an expert in that style. Find all your favorite styles including Hard Bop, Smooth Jazz, Vocals, Swing, Sinatra Style, and many more!Visit us online at http://www.JAZZRADIO.com to learn more.FEATURES:- Listen to 30+ hand-programmed jazz music channels - Not sure which channel to pick? Explore the easy-to-use Styles list - Stream music from the app or in the background while you do other things- Control audio and view track titles from the lock screen- Save your favorite channels for quick and easy access later- New Sleep Timer feature allows you to fall asleep to music without draining your data plan- Set data streaming preferences for when using a Cellular vs. WiFi network- Share your favorite tracks and channels on Facebook, Twitter, or by email- Optional buffer bar with data display helps you keep track of your data usage- New listener? Try JAZZRADIO.com Premium for free for 7 days in the app to listen commercial-free- Ready to upgrade? Purchase JAZZRADIO.com Premium quickly and easily in the app CHANNEL LIST: - Avant Garde- Bass Jazz- Bebop- Blues- Blues Rock- Bossa Nova- Classic Jazz- Contemporary Vocals- Cool Jazz- Current Jazz- Fusion Lounge- Guitar Jazz- Gypsy Jazz- Hard Bop- Holiday Jazz- Latin Jazz- Mellow Jazz- Mellow Smooth Jazz- Paris CafÃ©- Piano Jazz- Piano Trios- Saxophone Jazz- Sinatra Style- Smooth Bossa Nova- Smooth Jazz- Smooth Jazz 24/7 - Smooth Lounge- Smooth Uptempo- Smooth Vocals- Straight Ahead- Swing & Big Band- Timeless Classics- Trumpet Jazz- Vibraphone Jazz- Vocal Legends

reviews.title: Amazing and smooth
reviews.comment: Love this each time I\'ve used it and recommend to everyone I know that is a jazz lover.
reviews.author: Charlie Foxleigh

reviews.comment: Just what I\'ve been looking for!!!!! After moving to a rural area with absolutely zero jazz stations, discovering this app is such a treasure.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its unfortunate...
reviews.comment: It was great b4 the last update, but now my biggest complaint is its not stable. I used to use it in the car all the time, but now i can\'t listen to music on it for more than two mins b4 it loses its signal while I\'m driving! :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Good. You should give permanent free premium for one selected channel, then ill give you 5 stars.
reviews.author: prathik prashanth

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: Better than XM, I can take it every where I can get a signal.
reviews.author: Katherine Webb

reviews.title: Help plz
reviews.comment: It always crashes in my phone xperia z 4.2.2 Rooted it used to work perfect before on 4.1, fix it plz i adore this app it\'s the best
reviews.author: Amr Galal

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I noticed that the track history is not shown on my Nexus 10. Other than that, everything about this app is great
reviews.author: Tae Hun Kim

reviews.title: Good radio
reviews.comment: Nice... Keep up the good quality music.
reviews.author: Marvin Lee

reviews.comment: Brilliant. Even the free version.
reviews.author: Peter Hiatt

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: No sound w/ update. Please fix.
reviews.author: Luis Carlos

reviews.comment: Not stable after last update, can\'t connect to channels, please fix it\tIt\'s a very nice app and thanks for all your works
reviews.author: Paul Tao

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: But hope that the high CPU usage problem can be fixed.
reviews.author: Johnson Tsai

reviews.title: Great selection!
reviews.comment: This is my \"goto\" music player.
reviews.author: Robert Gestwicki

reviews.comment: Excellent!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Mocking Bird

reviews.title: My Plants Love it.
reviews.comment: My flora has \"spoken\". They shot up fast listening to the smooth jazz radio. Also great for sex.  Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great...so user friendly!
reviews.comment: Great...easy to use ! Luv that sleep/timer option!! Always something good playing, dj`s are super easy on the ears and anytime of day/night hits the spot :)
reviews.author: Marietta Roberts

reviews.comment: Best source for jazz, period.
reviews.author: Adrian Wilhelmsen

reviews.comment: Nice collection of jazz songs
reviews.author: Gaurav Joshi

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great audio quality. Many different choices of jazz. I have this app playing all the time. Very inspirational.
reviews.author: Melissa Irick

reviews.comment: Fantastic app
reviews.author: Stefanos Stavropoulos
